snippet.title: BLACKHEART Launch Announcement Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Now it's official! Blackheart will be launching on Steam THIS OCTOBER! 

If you haven't already, be sure to wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2410150/Blackheart/

Subscribe to follow along with the game's development!

#indiegames #trailer #actionrpg #darkfantasygame #devlog
